allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: TreasureTogether - Complete photo sharing app

TreasureTogether is a mobile-first photo sharing application built with Flutter 
and Supabase, designed for seamless photo sharing during trips and events.

Features implemented:
- Camera-first UX with direct photo capture and auto-save to device
- Event/group management with invite code system
- Photo upload, download, and gallery view
- Photo management: delete photos, edit captions
- Group features: view members, leave events
- Real-time sync with Supabase backend
- Comprehensive error handling and loading states
- Polished UI/UX with Material 3 design
- Multi-platform support: Web, Windows, Android, iOS

Tech stack:
- Flutter 3.8.0+ with Material 3
- Supabase (PostgreSQL + Storage + Auth)
- Provider for state management
- Image handling: image_picker, cached_network_image
- Local storage: shared_preferences

Architecture:
- Service layer for business logic (AuthService, GroupService, PhotoService)
- Model classes with JSON serialization
- Provider-based state management
- Row-level security policies in Supabase

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
